tag_list: parcel-delivery, courier-uk, great-britain, postage, package, cheap, cheapest, express
overview:
myHermes.co.uk is a parcel delivery service which collects and delivers parcels, door-to-door, 6 days a week throughout the UK. Delivery takes between 3-5 working days.

No need to queue at the post office, users simply enter the details online and someone collects the parcel from their door, or a safe place of their choice if no-one is home! The courier makes three attempts to deliver the parcel at the destination, so thereâ€™s not just an annoying card left after one failed attempt.

The price of postage is competitive, with prices starting from Â£3.49, and itâ€™s really easy for people to use. Ordering is done online, with collection and delivery of the parcels taking place door-to-door through a network of local couriers around England, Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland.

Customers can track and trace parcels online, and there is a dedicated customer services team seven days a week.
